CustomField.formula: IF ( ISBLANK(Last_Month_Forecast__c) ,IF( RecordType.Name = 'Drawdown' ,Total_Drawdown_Rollover__c - Total_Repay_Due_Amount__c , Current_Ending_Balance__c - Total_Repay_Due_Amount__c + Total_Drawdown_Rollover__c ) ,Last_Month_Ending_Balance__c - Total_Repay_Due_Amount__c + Total_Drawdown_Rollover__c)
CustomField.label: F Projected Balance
